description:
Scott's got military looks written all over him. He's also kind of got that all-American apple pie thang goin' on. He seems like a super nice guy too. Some of the innocent guys have a hidden naughty-side, but I think Scott is pretty much a "what you see is what you get" type of guy. He' matter-of-fact, and straight forward.
He's a little powerhouse too. I love his buff meaty build, and I think his tatts totally complete his style.
A high school wrestler, he is truly a boy you'd want to roll around in bed with and get a headlock on with.
When I edited his video, I kept singing "Bouncy bouncy balls" (editing video can get boring, the mind wanders) His nuts have got to have the most motion of any of the models I have had the pleasure to film. Bounce! Bounce! BOUNCE!
I wonder if he likes to have them tugged on?
He's about as masculine as they come, and have to admit, it would be awesome to see if I could talk him in to an 'edge' video. Do something naughty to the innocent boy wonder!
title: Scott - Solo
